medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain since prior day of admission.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started the day before admission and was more severe than previous similar pain experienced with urinary tract infections. Patient experienced vomiting once and decreased oral intake with anorexia for 30 hours.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple sclerosis, diabetes mellitus type 1, benign leucocytopenia, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, anemia, foot neuropathy, retinopathy.
